name: LectureRush
description:
Controls:

Mouse Left:    Place students
Mouse Right:  Kick students out
W,A,S,D:         Move professor

You are a professor who wants nothing more than to finish his lecture in peace and go home. But like most of them tend to do, your lecture hall is not empty.

Instead it's filled with students of the worst and most annoying kind one can possibly imagine.

Will you survive?

P.S. If you want more than 10 fps in some scenes download the exe...
